testcase.name: User Verifies if new payee has been added in the Payees page
testcase.system-out: Given user launch chrome browser............................................passed When user open Internet Banking home page...................................passed And user click menu button..................................................passed And user click payees.......................................................passed Then user verifies that Payees page is loaded...............................passed When user click add button..................................................passed And user input payees details...............................................passed And user click add payee button.............................................passed Then user verifies that new payee has been added in the list of payee and the list is sorted in ascending order by default.passed And user click name header..................................................passed Then user verifies that the list is sorted in descending order..............passed

testcase.name: User Navigates to Payment Page
